id.description: UUID (v5) for the Set (atomic) generated by YGOJSON.

prefix.description: Prefix of the set in English (if available).

name.description: Name of the set in English (if available).

prefix.description: Prefix of the set in this locale (localized).

name.description: Name of the set in this locale (translated).

es.description:
Describes set text that can be localized.

Only set information that is not an enum is included.

prefix.description: Prefix of the set in this locale (localized).

name.description: Name of the set in this locale (translated).

ja.description:
Describes set text that can be localized.

Only set information that is not an enum is included.

localizedData.description:
Describes translations and locale-specific data for a set.

All translated properties match the name of the original property
and any missing property indicates no translation for it.

description:
Describes the information for a set.

This model contains the properties of the set.
